videos.title: Inception
videos.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea. As layers of reality blur, danger becomes real.

videos.title: The Dark Knight
videos.description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who plunges Gotham into chaos. As he pushes the limits of heroism, moral lines are crossed.

videos.title: Interstellar
videos.description: Earth is dying, and a team of explorers travel through a wormhole in search of a new home. Love and science collide across space and time.

videos.title: Avatar
videos.description: A paraplegic Marine is dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission, becoming torn between following orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

videos.title: 3 Idiots
videos.description: Three friends navigate the pressures of college life in a rigid educational system. A journey of self-discovery, friendship, and rebellion unfolds.

videos.title: Dangal
videos.description: A former wrestler trains his daughters to become world-class champions. Based on the true story of India's wrestling heroes.

videos.title: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara
videos.description: Three friends take a road trip across Spain that changes their lives. A heartfelt tale of adventure, love, and second chances.

videos.title: Shershaah
videos.description: Based on the life of Captain Vikram Batra, this war drama showcases his bravery during the Kargil War and the love that fueled his courage.

videos.title: Oppenheimer
videos.description: The story of J. Robert Oppenheimer and the creation of the atomic bomb. A gripping look into ambition, consequence, and genius.

videos.title: Pathaan
videos.description: An exiled RAW agent returns to stop a biological attack on India. Packed with action, drama, and patriotic fervor.

videos.title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
videos.description: A woman discovers she must connect with versions of herself across the multiverse to stop a cosmic threat. Surreal, emotional, and wildly original.

videos.title: Jawan
videos.description: A vigilante with a mysterious past takes on a corrupt system. A high-octane action film filled with twists and emotion.
